queryHandle.description: Query handle containing work items to analyze (prevents ID hallucination)

intent.description: Natural language description of the analysis you want (e.g., 'find items that are blockers for the release', 'identify work items with insufficient technical detail', 'assess readiness for AI assignment')

itemSelector.description: Item selection: 'all', array of IDs, or selection criteria object

skip.description: Number of items to skip for pagination (default: 0)

includeContextPackages.description: Retrieve full context packages for deeper analysis (default true)

contextDepth.description: Context detail level: basic (fields only), standard (default, with relations/comments), deep (full history)

organization.description: Azure DevOps organization (uses config default if not provided)

project.description: Azure DevOps project (uses config default if not provided)
